title: Bangladesh's former finance minister AMA Muhith passes away - ThePrint
content: Bangladesh's former finance minister AMA Muhith passes away  ThePrint
description: Dhaka, Apr 30 (PTI) Bangladesh’s former finance minister AMA Muhith passed away Saturday at a private hospital here due to old age complications. He was 88. Muhith passed away at 12:56 am at United Hospital in Dhaka, his personal secretary Jony Bhattacharjee told reporters here. His younger brother and Foreign Minister AK Abdul Momen also […]
